overview: Andy Lynn is the CEO and Founder of Kickanotch mobile, as well as the QR code division Scanlutions. He has over 12 years of experience in marketing, sales, finance, and IT utilization fields that led him to forming Scanlutions. Andy spent his college years working in marketing and sales for a student travel company and a local Kansas City metro radio station. That is when he first realized his talent for turning creativity into ROI for businesses. After graduating from Washburn University with a BA in Corporate Communications he took a position with an automotive financial services company as a marketing manager where he grew his knowledge of technology, sales, and client implementation. After several promotions and spending over 6 years with Drive Financial Services, the company had tripled in revenue and was purchased by Banco Santander, one of the worldâ€™s largest banks. Andy stayed on an additional 2 years with Banco Santander and exited in 2008 to become an entrepreneur using his sales and marketing skills to market technology, software, and client profits in a whole new way. Andy has founded, grown, and maintained several businesses across different industries. His leadership, drive, ambition, and skill set has helped lead Kickanotch mobile and Scanlutions QR Code exclusive technology into the new era of mobile marketing.
